description:
With unexpected help from Ohtenkun, leader of the Juttenkun, Yozen has removed Kingo Island`s barrier. The battle takes a drastic turn as Konron Mountain crashes into Kingo Island. Taikobo makes the decision to infiltrate Kingo Island and rescue Yozen, who is wounded after fighting Chotenkun, but Ohtenkun anticipates his arrival and forms a strategy to counterattack using the Juttenkun. Thus Taikobo, Supushan, and Yozen`s master Gyokutei Shinjin begin the rescue mission.
Source: crunchyroll
